mapper.sql: id, test_id, name, create_time, update_time, status
mapper.select: select ltr.id, ltr.name, ltr.test_id as testId, ltr.description, ltr.create_time as createTime, ltr.update_time as updateTime, ltr.status as status, ltr.test_name as testName, p.id as projectId, p.name as projectName from load_test_report ltr left join load_test lt on ltr.test_id = lt.id join project p on ltr.project_id = p.id where ltr.id = #{id}

SELECT min(create_time) AS date, count(load_test_report.id) AS count, date_format(from_unixtime(create_time / 1000), '%Y-%m-%d') AS x FROM load_test_report WHERE test_id IN (SELECT load_test.id FROM load_test JOIN project ON load_test.project_id = project.id WHERE workspace_id = #{workspaceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND create_time > #{startTimestamp} GROUP BY x
SELECT resource_id FROM load_test_report_log WHERE report_id = #{reportId} GROUP BY resource_id
